root: ^You are... quite young for a ghost.
^And you’re quite young for a fox.
^Oh... Sorry. I didn’t mean it like that.
^Hah, got you! It’s been ages since I have been able to prank someone.
^You know, I used to be the master prankster when I was alive.
^Me and my cousin Owly were an amazing jokester duo.

dialogueAfterChoice: ^Yes. He was the mastermind behind all the ideas we had together. I was just a face telling the jokes and presenting the pranks.
^Let me tell you, he was a coward. But I must say I miss that coward.
^He probably misses you too. He’s here. In the other side of the woods.
^Really? Are you sure? You’re not pranking me back right now?
^He’s really there. And a bit lonely, too. He was afraid to come and talk to you.
^Amazing! I must go and find him soon!
^We have so much to talk about!
